divs: Sighting DetailsBright Light in the SW sky appeared to be towards Channahon IL. from my house in Mokena.. I watched it for 15 minutes as I sat by my front door. It sort of appeared to be moving as I thought it was an incoming airplane to Midway Airport but then it just hovered at a stand still. As I sat by my front door watching the object I gauged it with a roof line for movement. It's movement (if any) was extremly slow maybe drifting towards the right from where I was at. I know the flight patterns and paths here as I see planes all the time. This wasn���t on any normal path to Midway Airport and why it caught my attention. I grabbed my camera and snapped a few shots. They came out dark but I lightened them up as much as I could. After 3 photos. The object started to desend below the roof tops to where I couldn���t see it anymore. The estimated size of the object I can't determine because of the distance between my observation point and the object itself. I can say with certainty that this was NOT a candle kite by no means. I am an observer of the skies since my first sighting in the early 70's. Since then, I observed 5 sightings in which I have no explanation.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Mokena
There were no other sightings in Mokena on or around September 24th 2013
Summary: Bright light hovered seemed to move somewhat gaugeing with roofline dimmed in/out then decended below roofline.
